short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI 超智能！自动清理浏览记录，一句话搞定隐私保护！ | Super intelligent AI! Clear browsing history with one command!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
一款由 AI 驱动的浏览器插件，帮助你自动管理和清理浏览记录。无论是工作、学习还是保护个人隐私，这款插件都能准确识别并保存你需要的网页，删除不必要的记录。再也不用手动清理历史记录了！快来了解这款神奇的插件吧，并在评论区分享你的想法和建议！
AI-powered browser plugin that automatically manages and cleans up your browsing history. Whether for work, study, or protecting personal privacy, this plugin can accurately identify and save the webpages you need while deleting unnecessary records. No more manual history cleanup! Discover this amazing plugin and share your thoughts and suggestions in the comments!
